title: You are allowed 1 LoL item in real life....
body:
try to think as realistic as possible
 Example:
{{item:3157}} would grant you temporary invulnerability in any situation
{{item:3075}} would reflect some damage in combat, like some bullet wounds, stab wounds exc.
{{item:3069}} grants you money every few seconds, more if something dies near you



Choose Wisely...
